resources.string: This app measures BPM (Beats Per Minute), measuring the frequency of your taps on the screen.
4 displays to average last 2, 5, 10 and 20 taps.
Any suggestions and feedback welcome - just write me. \nI read all e-mail ;)

The No BS Tap Tempo app:
Ads are BS, therefore The No BS Tap Tempo app shows no ads.
